description: Create a campaign for gifts and products

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is an integer the timestamp of the request. Format in milliseconds.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the API. Use the token returned when it expires.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id and other required parameters

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date of Campaign e.g. "01-11-2025". Do not fill in case date

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking
